title: Wolf Buff Request.
body: As it stands i rarely jungle, but one thing i noticed today from smiting wolf is, that it gives pings that give unreliable data to your teammates (It uses on my way and assistance pings) can we have this changed to something a bit better like Danger pings or something of the like, it's just from what i could tell, my team mates thought i was making the pings for it, and before today i actually thought the jungler were making those pings for the wolf buff (i only realize now that it was the wolf smite buff doing so.).

replies.body: What it does is create an orb which then moves to enemy champions in the jungle in question. The "on my way" ping is relevant because the orb is letting you know it is moving to somewhere. It's easy to tell it's not from a player because it doesn't have a player icon waypointing to it.
i didn't know it pinged i just thought it gave vision?
If someone moves into the area of vision at the start of it's movement it will ping on my way, once it spots them it will ping for assistance.
really? i have never experienced this? id have to try it out :D
